wholeRules: Everyone speaks in a russian accent.
Everyone wants to prove they're better than ${improviser()}.
The scene takes place on a boat.
The scene takes place in a bathroom.
${uniqueImproviser()} and ${uniqueImproviser()} swap characters every time ${improviser()} speaks.
${improviser()} won't make eye contact with anyone.
Everyone has a mouthful of hotdogs they cannot swallow.
Everyone is clumsy and falls over often.
Everyone refers to themselves in 3rd person.
${uniqueImproviser()} and ${uniqueImproviser()} are joined at the hip.
${improviser()} is revealed to be scooby doo.
The scene takes place in an elevator.
The scene is now a romantic comedy.
The scene is now a western.
The scene takes place in the 1800s.
The scene takes place in the 2080s.
The scene takes place in a hot tub.
Everyone is constantly entering and leaving the scene.
${improviser()} is beholden to all of ${improviser()}'s rules.
${improviser()} is on fire and it cannot be put out.
The scene takes place in a toaster.
${improviser()} is attached to ${improviser()}'s hands by invisible ropes.
${improviser()} is caught in a 15 second time loop.
Everyone gives up on their goals.
Every other word ${improviser()} speaks is silent.
Everyone points at whoever they're talking to.
Everyone points at whoever they're not talking to.
${improviser()} believes he is at a golf course.
40 mph wind is blowing from stage right.
Everyone faces the audience at all times.
The room is full of potato chips.
Everyone is macho man randy savage.
${improviser()} and 2 speak for one another instead of themselves.
Everyone speaks in one word sentences.
${improviser()} invents a machine that calls out improv rules.
Everyone wakes up from the dream they've been having so far.
George washington is now in the scene, invisible to the audience.
${improviser()} can only use words that start with vowels.
${improviser()} cannot stop his arms flailing about.
There are now 7 characters in the scene.
${improviser()} is now their character, but realizes they're  fictional.
${improviser()} wants to kill the computer God.
Everyone else experiences terrible pain whenever ${improviser()} speaks.
${improviser()} does the opposite of everything ${improviser()} does.
Everyone is dancing to club music.
Every sentence must include a reference to Wayne Gretzky.
${improviser()} can say nothing except currently active rules.
Whenever facing stage right, characters are 90 years old.
Everyone does the scene with their eyes closed.
Everyone is such a good boy.
${improviser()} wants to use ${improviser()} as a weapon.
${improviser()}'s face is glued to the floor.
${improviser()} is a half-demon sorcerer, heir to the throne of hell.
${improviser()} is mortally ashamed of his appearance.
${improviser()} wants to be loved by everyone.
${improviser()} has the strength of an infant.
